committees.committee: House Post Office and Civil Service
House Post Office and Civil Service

official_title: A bill to provide for a reduction in the number of Federal employees through voluntary attrition.

summary.text: Federal Attrition Timetable - Requires a ten percent reduction in the number of Federal employees from the number of such employees on December 1, 1980, to be attained by voluntary attrition by calendar year 1985.

titles.title: A bill to provide for a reduction in the number of Federal employees through voluntary attrition.
